title: GS Blockchain
author: GS Blockchain
content: Genesis, a decentralized commercial metaverse platform, has recently attracted Axis Ventures. Axis Ventures expressed its appreciation for Genesisâ€™s business logic and consensus mechanism, and considered it as a new innovation in the crypto industry.Axis Ventures, a venture capital focuses on early-stage technology companies in fintech such as Web3, Gaming and Metaverse. Its strategic partners include KuCoin, AC Capital, Pixelverse, Kommunitas, FantomFDN and etc.
